```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read-csv}
Mapping <- read_delim("data_raw/map_for_compilation_OM17.txt",  delim = "\t")
```

```{r}
Mapping 
```

```{r}
Mapping_edit <- Mapping %>% mutate(barcode_anchored_5_prime = paste0("^", barcode_sequence))
Mapping_edit <- Mapping_edit  %>% mutate(sample_id = paste0(">", sample_id))
Mapping_edit  <- Mapping_edit  %>% mutate(fasta = paste0(sample_id, "\n", barcode_anchored_5_prime))
Mapping_edit  <- Mapping_edit  %>% select(fasta)
Mapping_edit_char <- Mapping_edit  %>% as_vector()
```
